attributes.action: Bring our troops home from Afghanistan now.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are now supporting a corrupt Government in  Afghanistan and we should NOT be endangering the lives of British soldiers in supporting this corrupt regime.  Why are we in the country- it is not for our homeland security which would be better served if we spent all the money currently assigned to the Afghan war (for what purpose or objective????) on homeland security

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
